Suport Tècnic : GLOBAL - ALTRES - Capçaleres WSS
================================================

Created by Unknown User (oteccmorales), last modified on 26 May 2021

Incluirem JIRA's amb els anàlisis realitzats sobre consultes d'aquest tipus:

  

[ST-13096](https://contacte.aoc.cat/browse/ST-13096?src=confmacro) - Data cannot be retrieved due to an unexpected error.

  

configurar SOAP

S'ha d'informar el binarySecurityToken:

![](attachments/41523263/41523381.png)

la clau és marcar "use single cert for signing" d'aquesta manera el valor ValueType="[http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3](http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3)".

La configuració completa que funciona:

![](attachments/41523263/41523382.png)

![](attachments/41523263/41523383.png)

Fent això, SIRI processa correctament.

**Capçalera WSS d'exemple:**

<wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">
<wsse:BinarySecurityToken EncodingType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-soap-message-security-1.0#Base64Binary" ValueType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3" wsu:Id="X509-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487850"></wsse:BinarySecurityToken>
<ds:Signature Id="SIG-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487953" xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#">
<ds:SignedInfo>
<ds:CanonicalizationMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#">
<ec:InclusiveNamespaces PrefixList="open pet soapenv" xmlns:ec="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#"/>
</ds:CanonicalizationMethod>
<ds:SignatureMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1"/>
<ds:Reference URI="#id-5E7753FCF7AE8CD7A416213355737228">
<ds:Transforms>
<ds:Transform Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#">
<ec:InclusiveNamespaces PrefixList="open pet" xmlns:ec="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#"/>
</ds:Transform>
</ds:Transforms>
<ds:DigestMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1"/>
<ds:DigestValue>9s+uvE5foqYSsMIuhAoTWamM1CM=</ds:DigestValue>
</ds:Reference>
</ds:SignedInfo>
<ds:SignatureValue>ZdSDgSam0n1Gmp9axNgZVSrTQvjcUC8ibukbk+YHY/cGV0CeNOnfIsSs9UICfafPUuc5o+qY+ppx
fq9aF8QXz8gjryz7flPtKP97RaYw3fAjg2HM01/4CoqeeSRkyIFpenMV7Ky4+rzrARckh2oJ+K79
vnEpUed9w1M5ijuGR8T0hlbdnYjH9haOzsh0tjZyWHSBoylwf8+wchiT4AlWMIT6Hcs5b+dwxSuk
AgHCOw6GFGqXMtMTXnktFCfXYYut5gE2Kwfzr7wyhP++ouKLfFQmqbAgX/ke4WJh/wgnM3q7k5dj
yarN13HWl5xidKWevwRY6LQQfDNUwQsa9x1DlA==</ds:SignatureValue>
<ds:KeyInfo Id="KI-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487851">
<wsse:SecurityTokenReference wsu:Id="STR-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487852">
<wsse:Reference URI="#X509-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487850" ValueType="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-x509-token-profile-1.0#X509v3"/>
</wsse:SecurityTokenReference>
</ds:KeyInfo>
</ds:Signature>
<wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="TS-58AEA91B18554E943E162195852487849">
<wsu:Created>2021-05-25T16:02:04.877Z</wsu:Created>
<wsu:Expires>2021-05-25T16:07:04.877Z</wsu:Expires>
</wsu:Timestamp>
</wsse:Security>

FP#400434
